m_szDocTitle: NVE Corporation's (NVEC) CEO Daniel Baker on Q1 2016 Results - Earnings Call Transcript | Seeking Alpha
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- NVE Corporation's (NVEC) CEO Daniel Baker on Q1 2016 Results - Earnings Call Transcript Q1 2016 Earnings Conference Call July 22, 2015 5:00 PM ET Executives Daniel Baker - President and Chief Executive Officer Curt Reynders - Chief Financial Officer, Treasurer and Secretary Analysts Charles Haff - Craig-Hallum Capital Group Thomas Cochran - Lake Road Partners Jeff Bernstein - Concept Capital Markets Operator Good day, ladies and gentlemen, and welcome to the NVE Conference Call on First Quarter 2016 Results. At this time, all participants are in a listen-only m
